message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. I think this is a great price considering the value it will bring to you, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $7500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still working within a tight budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $8000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
